text: All players discard 1 card, mill 1 card, and sacrifice a creature, enchantment, or artifact
Naturalize: each player sacrifices an enchantment or artifact
Doom Blade: each player sacrifices a non-black creature
Lightning Bolt: each player chooses a target they control to receive 3 damage
Hurricane: all flying creatures controlled by players and players receive {x} damage
Black Sun Zenith: All players but {x} -1/-1 counters on creatures they control
Earthquake: all non-flying creatures controlled by players and players receive {x} damage
Dark Deal: all players discards all the cards in their hand and draws that many cards minus 1
Desert Twister: each player sacrifices one permanent
Fireball: all players take {x*3) damage
Drain Life: all players take {x} damage and troll king gains {xp} life
Stream of life: troll king gains {x*3} life
Cinder Wall: Troll King casts {x} Cinder walls, they are 3/3 defenders that are destroyed at the end of combat if they block
Blood Artist: Troll King casts blood artist, a 0/1 creature with this ability: whenever any creature dies all players lose 1 life and Troll King gains 1 life
Ball Lightning: Troll King casts a Ball Lightning for each player and attacks. Ball Lightning is a 6/1 creature with trample.
Return to Nature: each player must sacrifice an artifact, an enchantment, or exile a card from a graveyard
Sign in Blood: each player draws 2 cards and loses 2 life
Chain Reaction: deals X damage to each creature where X is the number of creatures on the battlefied
Fog: creatures deal no combat damage next turn
Each player may draw a card OR play an extra land OR gain 5 life
